tool_description:
Exchange Rates from Investing.com web site
It gets the ability to know the current exchange rate for specific pair of currency.
name: Exchange Rate API
title: Exchange Rate API

api_list.name: Get current exchange rate
api_list.description: Getting current exchange rate for specific currency pair
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate-api2.p.rapidapi.com/currencies/rub-usd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rate-api2.p.rapidapi.com/currencies/{currencycode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rate-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
